cuisines.name: American
cuisines.description: American cuisine is a melting pot of diverse and innovative food culture. It features dishes from many different regions of the United States, including burgers, hot dogs, barbecue, fried chicken, and apple pie.

cuisines.name: British
cuisines.description: British cuisine is a hearty mix of dishes from different regions of the United Kingdom. It features comforting classics like meat and potatoes, and popular dishes like fish and chips and bangers and mash.

cuisines.name: Chinese
cuisines.description: Chinese cuisine is a harmonious blend of flavors, with an emphasis on savory, sweet, and sour tastes. It features stir-fries, noodles, soups, dumplings, and steamed buns, all cooked with precision and finesse.

cuisines.name: Indian
cuisines.description: Indian cuisine is a fiery combination of diverse flavors, spices and herbs, with a wide variety of vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes. It features spicy curries, savory breads, fragrant rice dishes and delectable desserts.

cuisines.name: Italian
cuisines.description: Italian cuisine is a celebration of simplicity, with an emphasis on fresh, high-quality ingredients. It features a variety of dishes including pasta, pizza, cured meats, cheeses, and seafood, all prepared with great care.

cuisines.name: Japanese
cuisines.description: Japanese cuisine is a celebration of simplicity and seasonality, featuring fresh, delicate flavors and simple preparations. It features sushi, sashimi, ramen, tempura, and teriyaki, all prepared with meticulous attention to detail.
